contest-event.event-date:
May 17, 2014 D SEWBBA (Merthyr Tydfil) Contest (Second Section)
SEWBBA (Merthyr Tydfil) Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Merthyr Tydfil) Contest sewbba-merthyr-tydfil-contest-second-section
Rhydycar Leisure Centre, Merthyr Tydfil, Merthyr Tydfil County, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Steve Jones, Horn (Ammanford) Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £150, 3rd £100. 9 bands competed.
May 18, 2014, 9:36 a.m. June 30, 2020, 10:54 a.m.
1 Ammanford Silver Band Glyn Davies Diversions - Variations on a Swiss Folk Song
2 Melingriffith 2 Band Robin Hackett Kaleidoscope [Sparke]
3 Ynyshir Band Gary Davies Olympus
4 Rogerstone Band Jeff Hutcherson Cry of the Mountain
5 Thomas Coaches Mid Rhondda Band Alan Gibbs Oceans
6 Briton Ferry Band Jeffrey Pearce Music for a Festival [Sparke]
7 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Malcolm Reed The Aeronauts
8 Crwbin Silver Band Ceri Thomas Music for a Festival [Sparke]
9 Cross Keys Silver Band Kerry Bowden Oceans
